entity.name: Chinmay Sarupria
entity.description: I am passionate about open source projects solving or assisting immensely in reducing pain points on any specific task or group of tasks. My work focuses on reducing scope of errors in any field using automation wherever possible.

projects.name: Non-Individual Forms Generator
projects.description: It allows to generate Zerodha account opening application forms with text based seal for account types like HUF, Private Limited, LLP and Partnership. It also generates annexures on entity letterhead, KYC, UBO and other documents thereby significantly speeding up the account opening process and helps in drastically reducing seal based errors.

channels.description: Will accept direct bank transfers. Please e-mail for details.

plans.name: Starter Support
plans.description: This will cover the development cost as well as future updates and maintenance.
